ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: There will be but one Great Blast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: It will only be a single blast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely they will need no more than a single stern blast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, it will only take a single blast
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So that is not but a single shout.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But it will be only a single Zajrah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But it shall be only a single cry,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But it shall be only a single scare,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Surely it will need but one shout,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But all it will take is a single blast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: It will be only one scaring shout,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Yet it will be only a single shout,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But verily, it will be but a single (Compelling) Cry,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But only, it will be a single Zajrah [shout (i.e., the second blowing of the Trumpet)]. (See Verse 37:19).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But it will be only a single blow,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But it will be only a single nudge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:13] God, exalted be He, says: But it, the Aftershock, which will be followed by the Resurrection, will be only a single blast, and so when it is blasted:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And so Allah said: (Surely it will need but one shout) one blow which does not require a second one, and this is the blow of the resurrection,
